verses.verse: Concerning the divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the porters <S%H7778><s%>: Of the Korhites <S%H7145><s%> was Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kore <S%H6981><s%>, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>. Meshelemiah: or, Shelemiah, ver.14. Asaph: or, Abiasaph Chap.9.19.& 6.37.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> were, Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, Jediael <S%H3043><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>, Jathniel <S%H3496><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>,
Elam <S%H5867><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%>, Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%>, Elioenai <S%H454><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%>.

Moreover the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Obededom <S%H5654><s%> were, Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, Jehozabad <S%H3075><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, Joah <S%H3098><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>, and Sacar <S%H7940><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>, and Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%>,

Ammiel <S%H5988><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%>, Issachar <S%H3485><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%>, Peulthai <S%H6469><s%> the eighth <S%H8066><s%>: for God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him. him: that is, Obededom

Also unto Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> were sons <S%H1121><s%> born <S%H3205><s%>, that ruled <S%H4474><s%> throughout the house <S%H1004><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%>: for they were mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>; Othni <S%H6273><s%>, and Rephael <S%H7501><s%>, and Obed <S%H5744><s%>, Elzabad <S%H443><s%>, whose brethren <S%H251><s%> were strong <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H1121><s%>, Elihu <S%H453><s%>, and Semachiah <S%H5565><s%>.

All these of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Obededom <S%H5654><s%>: they and their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their brethren <S%H251><s%>, able <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> for strength <S%H3581><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%>, were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> of Obededom <S%H5654><s%>.
And Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> had sons <S%H1121><s%> and brethren <S%H251><s%>, strong <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H1121><s%>, eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%>.

Also Hosah <S%H2621><s%>, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, had sons <S%H1121><s%>; Simri <S%H8113><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>, (for though he was not the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, yet his father <S%H1><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> him the chief <S%H7218><s%>;)

Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, Tebaliah <S%H2882><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>, Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>: all the sons <S%H1121><s%> and brethren <S%H251><s%> of Hosah <S%H2621><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%>.

Among these were the divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the porters <S%H7778><s%>, even among the chief <S%H7218><s%> men <S%H1397><s%>, having wards <S%H4931><s%> one against <S%H5980><s%> another <S%H251><s%>, to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%>, as well the small <S%H6996><s%> as the great <S%H1419><s%>, according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, for every gate <S%H8179><s%>. as well: or, as well for the small as for the great

And the lot <S%H1486><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> to Shelemiah <S%H8018><s%>. Then for Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, a wise <S%H7922><s%> counsellor <S%H3289><s%>, they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%>; and his lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>. Shelemiah: also called Meshelemiah, ver. I.
To Obededom <S%H5654><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>; and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Asuppim <S%H624><s%>. Asuppim: Heb. gatherings

To Shuppim <S%H8206><s%> and Hosah <S%H2621><s%> the lot came forth westward <S%H4628><s%>, with the gate <S%H8179><s%> Shallecheth <S%H7996><s%>, by the causeway <S%H4546><s%> of the going up <S%H5927><s%>, ward <S%H4929><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> ward <S%H4929><s%>.

Eastward <S%H4217><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> Levites <S%H3881><s%>, northward <S%H6828><s%> four <S%H702><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%>, southward <S%H5045><s%> four <S%H702><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%>, and toward Asuppim <S%H624><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%>.
At Parbar <S%H6503><s%> westward <S%H4628><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> at the causeway <S%H4546><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> at Parbar <S%H6503><s%>.
These are the divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the porters <S%H7778><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kore <S%H7145><s%>, and among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>.

And of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Ahijah <S%H281><s%> was over the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and over the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the dedicated things <S%H6944><s%>. dedicated: Heb. holy things

As concerning the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Laadan <S%H3936><s%>; the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonite <S%H1649><s%> Laadan <S%H3936><s%>, chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%>, even of Laadan <S%H3936><s%> the Gershonite <S%H1649><s%>, were Jehieli <S%H3172><s%>. Laadan: or, Libni, Chap.16.17. Jehieli: or, Jehiel, Chap.23.8.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jehieli <S%H3172><s%>; Zetham <S%H2241><s%>, and Joel <S%H3100><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, which were over the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Of the Amramites <S%H6020><s%>, and the Izharites <S%H3325><s%>, the Hebronites <S%H2276><s%>, and the Uzzielites <S%H5817><s%>:
And Shebuel <S%H7619><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, was ruler <S%H5057><s%> of the treasures <S%H214><s%>.

And his brethren <S%H251><s%> by Eliezer <S%H461><s%>; Rehabiah <S%H7345><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Jeshaiah <S%H3470><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Joram <S%H3141><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Zichri <S%H2147><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Shelomith <S%H8019><s%> <S%H8013><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

Which Shelomith <S%H8013><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> were over all the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the dedicated things <S%H6944><s%>, which David <S%H1732><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, and the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%>, the captains <S%H8269><s%> over thousands <S%H505><s%> and hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, and the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%>, had dedicated <S%H6942><s%>.

Out of the spoils <S%H7998><s%> won in battles <S%H4421><s%> did they dedicate <S%H6942><s%> to maintain <S%H2388><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. spoils: Heb. battles and spoils

And all that Samuel <S%H8050><s%> the seer <S%H7200><s%>, and Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%>, and Abner <S%H74><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ner <S%H5369><s%>, and Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%>, had dedicated <S%H6942><s%>; and whosoever had dedicated <S%H6942><s%> any thing, it was under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Shelomith <S%H8019><s%>, and of his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

Of the Izharites <S%H3325><s%>, Chenaniah <S%H3663><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were for the outward <S%H2435><s%> business <S%H4399><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%>, for officers <S%H7860><s%> and judges <S%H8199><s%>.

And of the Hebronites <S%H2276><s%>, Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, men <S%H1121><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, were officers <S%H6486><s%> among them of Israel <S%H3478><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward <S%H4628><s%> in all the business <S%H4399><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and in the service <S%H5656><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>. officers: Heb. over the charge

Among the Hebronites <S%H2276><s%> was Jerijah <S%H3404><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>, even among the Hebronites <S%H2276><s%>, according to the generations <S%H8435><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>. In the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> they were sought <S%H1875><s%> for, and there were found <S%H4672><s%> among them mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%> at Jazer <S%H3270><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.

And his brethren <S%H251><s%>, men <S%H1121><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, were two thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%>, whom king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> made rulers <S%H6485><s%> over the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4520><s%>, for every matter <S%H1697><s%> pertaining to God <S%H430><s%>, and affairs <S%H1697><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>. affairs: Heb. thing
